amendment.description: To tighten oversight of energy markets.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 876 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 55 - 44. Record Vote Number: 218.
Amendment SA 876 proposed by Senator Feinstein. (consideration: CR S7590-7594) To tighten oversight of energy markets.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 876 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 55 - 44. Record Vote Number: 218.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 876 proposed by Senator Feinstein.
